name: Shigyaku Keiyakusha Fausts
nutshell: Tamiya Rokuto and Endou Hiroto are both child prodigies in the mathematics world, but they are both terminally ill. These two stay at a special hospital that is being run by a Christian group, where nuns act as nurses and priests act as doctors. At this hospital, all of the patients are highly respected academics in their own field. These individuals have been gathered to decode a special book that allegedly contains the secrets to immortality. To save Endou's life, Tamiya sets out to decode this mysterious book, but there seems to be demonic forces that come with this forbidden book.

name: Fluffy
nutshell: 《Fluffy》 is a serialized webcomic written by Yang Xiaoru. The comic tells of a rainy night, when the stray dog taken home by a girl, turned into a boy with shaggy hair.

name: Motoka no Shokudou
nutshell:
In an era of space travel, there is a small restaurant in Jupiter's orbit named after its owner, Motoka. People coming to or leaving the stars come through her small restaurant, and she always has something to serve that speaks to her customers' hearts and memories.
Some may say that the universe itself conspires for the curious encounters to happen at the tiny asteroid, it being in the proverbial fringe between the pale blue dot and the space beyond for the travelers, who while visiting find answers that they may have not been looking for, but whose questions lingered in silent vigilance, ever present in the back of their minds.

Links:

Author's Twitter

name: Wake Up, Warrior
nutshell:
I became the warriors’ benefactor…?
One day, the five heroes from the legends appeared in my front yard.
The antidote I made without thinking worked?! Really?
I hate saving lives, but I’ve lost the will to say no.
Let’s just treat them as soon as possible and let them go.
However, the atmosphere that surrounded the warriors was very strange.
“Ms. Kacana, no one here will send you off alone. ”
“Why don’t you warm up? The most important thing is your body.”
“Why are you hiding so many secrets, Kacana?”
“Do you like my scent that much?”
“I’m a bit of a freak in bed.”
I’m not accidentally leading them on, am I?

name: The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes's Great-Granddaughter
nutshell:
(from ebookjapan):
Miruku Katsuragi, an energetic high school girl with a 7th dan in kendo, ends up taking the place of the company president's daughter.
Miruku stays at a mountain villa for a week to receive special training for the daughter, but things don't go well...
In addition, "Dynamite Milk Pie," "My Mei Tachi" and "The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes' Great-grandson" are also included in this volume.

name: A Romcom With a Girly Guy and a Boyish Girl
nutshell: Noa Kagura is a cross-dresser who gets asked out by Shinobu Takada, a boyish girl on their school's karate team.

name: Black Behemoth
nutshell:
The story follows 6 contestant participating in an all-out battle to become the Talisman as a new turning point in their lives.
However is it only a matter of time before their past catches up with them?

name: Gurume no Fukurami
nutshell: Namura Tsutomu has a special condition where due to calorie consumption, he gets a raging hard-on every time he eats. He gets help to cure his irregular erections from Kaiyama and Masaki of human research institute, who find his condition fascinating. Things continue like this until he meet the handsome heir, Shiga Haruka, whose gentle touch seems to help him.

name: Misu-senpai no Amai Kakehiki
nutshell:
「君のこと、独り占めしたい」
入社2年目、ひそかに憧れていた先輩・三須先輩に告白された村瀬。
「なぜ私なんかを…」と返事に悩むうちに、気づけば告白から2週間が経過。
さすがに、そろそろ返事をしようと思っていた矢先、
なぜか三須先輩と一緒に、毎年行う懇親会の企画担当をすることに！
気まずいかと思いきや、いつもどおりな三須先輩にで安心した村瀬。
だけど、隣にいるだけでドキドキが止まらなくて…！
さらには、三須先輩からもう一度気持ちを伝えられて――…!?
憧れの先輩から突然の告白！
気づけば甘いワナにハマっていて…!?
【策略家な彼】×【真面目な彼女】の焦れきゅんラブ♪

name: 86 -Eighty Six-: Mini Comics
nutshell:
TVアニメ「８６―エイティシックス―」の魅力を、ゆるーく、ほっこりする内容でお届けするデフォルメマンガです！
cotori先生が描く、アニメ本編とはひと味違う「８６―エイティシックス―」の世界観をお楽しみください！

name: An Aristocratic Engagement: The President's Wife Is a Little Wild
nutshell: What do you do when your fiancé just can’t seem to keep it in his pants? Well, she decided to keep her options open, thinking that she could cancel the engagement… Only to find out that it wasn’t going to be as easy as she thought it would be! And so, she turned to the neighbor for help: "young master Shao, let’s strike a deal." Young master Shao huffed, "no, I can’t be bothered." "Young master Shao, are you even a mad?" "Since you say I’m not a man, I guess that I should prove to you that I’m one..."

name: Camgoroshi
nutshell: A passenger plane over the Pacific Ocean crash-lands on a nearby island. It was an island not on the nautical chart, where the native "Shimabitos" lived a barbaric life. Gamou, a young royal family on the island, orders the Shimabitos to attack the aircraft and the survivors! A blood-colored flame dwelled prequel of "Ingoshima"!

name: Dream Company
nutshell:
A multinational conglomerate develops an extremely intelligent AI that is capable of dreaming.
문명을 지배하는 거대기업과
거대기업을 움직이는 인공지능.
그 인공지능이 꿈을 꾸기 시작했다.

name: Steins;Gate - Comic Anthology: Time Traveler's Tale
How to Avoid Debut
nutshell:
[Dearly Presented to you by: Happy Croissant Scans~!]
Hahyun, a practical dance department graduate from Korean Arts High School; at the request of his uncle, he became a stand-in for an idol audition program, Survival ID.
As originally planned, Hahyun received the “edited,” “invisible,” “rapid fail” ending, but was able to survive every stage with the help(?) of fans…
‘Uncle, I want to get off… TT'
Hahyun, who once loved dancing injured his body, and abandoned all his dreams.
"Since I gave up, what is this reality that debut is nearing again?"
“Sunbae, I like your dancing.”
Besides, where did the participant ‘Jigu’ who knows Hahyun’s past come from?!

name: Gekikou Kamen
nutshell: A man meets up with his university tokusatsu circle after the passing of their leader.

name: The King's First Embrace
nutshell:
Qin Xiaoqing, a pretty female vampire, was cursed by another jealous vampire and sent to another realm. There she met the king of the vampire who's got a hot face and a six- pack that no girl can resist. However, the curse she got made men think that she was ugly. Then how could she seduce the hot vampire king?
(Chapters 1-43 can be read on WeComics.)

name: If I'm Going to Fall In Love, You're the One
nutshell:
This is a four-frame manga about a predatory romantic comedy battle between an annoying girl vs. an ill-timed boy.
(Translated with permission from the author)

name: Medical Crazy Soldier
nutshell: He used to be a sharp blade in China, the king of kings in the military world, and a member of Tianjian (10 Heavenly sword)! He is also the Oriental king of hell who created the underground world in the West! He said, “my name is Liu Feng. Liu, who is surnamed Liu, is a romantic wind. I’m good at two things, one is killing people, the other is saving people. The ghost messengers can’t take away the people I want to save, and heaven can’t save the people I want to kill.

name: Spirit Migration
nutshell: A spirit was floating in another world's dungeon, missing its memories. Eventually "he" learned to possess other creatures and using the bodies of the beasts in the dungeon, made his way to the outside world. Dragging a young female knight, a pretty young lady, and even a beautiful mercenary into the mix, our protagonist begins his great adventure in this world!

name: I Raised A Tiger Cub
nutshell:
The kid next door came back as an adult. What he is aiming for.. is my ♡♡..?!
Choi In-ho, the kid next door who took care of him when he was young, appears in the basement of this ordinary office worker. Due to In-ho's fraud (?), he suddenly ends up living in the basement.
Inho, who has been in love with the kid since his childhood, tries to seduce him, but fails once and for all..
What do we do to flirt with this dull brother?!

name: Robotics;Notes
nutshell: In 2019, childhood friends Yashio Kaito and Senomiya Akiho are in their last year of high school. Together, they are the only students in the robotics club, which has lost its school funding. Akiho is passionate about robots, and longs to complete building the robot her older sister Misaki began in this same club. Kaito doesn't really care about robots, and is obsessed with video games, specifically "Kill Ballad Online." However, he stays in the robotics club due to his friendship with Akiho. Now, just after Kaito is accused of cheating in his favorite game, Akiho decides to risk her club's existence in exchange for the funding to finally finish her sister's giant robot…

name: I am Picking up Fragments in Player Unknown's Battleground (PUBG)
nutshell: Jiang Siming suddenly discovered that the PlayerUnknown's Battlegrounds he played was different from others. He can find fragments of various colors in the game. After synthesis, he can turn into various kinds of treasures such as skills, attributes, talents, money, antiques, even medicines, exercises, etc. Relying on constantly picking up pieces in the game, Jiang Siming completed a life counterattack and made a fortune!

name: GHOUL CRUSH: Now That I'm Haunted by a Lesbian
nutshell: Unit 96 of Sampaguita Residences is haunted– not that Sison particularly believes in all of that… much to the chagrin of the actual ghoul that haunts there, a sapphic spirit once called Laguna. UPDATES EVERY SUNDAY STARTING 01.30.21

name: Girl (Jeon Young Hui)
nutshell: The story is about Jung Won who lives with her mother, a florist. One day, when her mother is on an errand, a wounded boy, Ha Jun, who is her classmate suddenly enters the shop. Jung Won is a quiet and shy girl whereas Ha Jun is the popular boy. Will this night change things between them?

name: Eulenspiegel
nutshell: Three disabled girls, Kagerou, Suzutsuki and Yuugiri (all named after famous Japanese warships), are equipped by the authorities with cybernetic body upgrades and recruited into a special task force called MPB to fight crime in 2016 in the Austrian town of Miliopolis.

name: Club Nintendo Comics
nutshell:
Club Nintendo was Nintendo's official, bimonthly published magazine in Germany.
A very special feature of the magazine were the Nintendo comics, most of them exclusively released in the magazine and drawn by Japanese manga artists.
While some of the comics are closely related to the games, there are also stories which are rather obscure and take place on Earth instead of the usual environments of the various Nintendo characters.
NOTES
Volume = Year
Chapter = Magazine Number

name: Ponkotsu Hero Eileen
nutshell: After oversleeping during an attack on Mars, our heroine Eileen is sent to Earth "to broaden her horizons." Eileen can only return to Mars after defeating her quota of monsters, but much to her dismay, Earth is much more peaceful than Mars. Partnering up with Earthing NEET Lovely Melon ☆, no one knows what lies ahead for our two heroines.

name: Super Income Treasure
nutshell:
When your mobile phone has a software that can generate countless money every day, what will you do?
See how Song Ping relies on a money system to reach the peak of life!
Beauty? Luxury cars? These are all things should be, there are things that can't be bought? Nonexistent!

name: Happy End o Shinjiteru
nutshell: Pure hearted but filthy minded fudanshi Hanamoto moves to Tokyo to find love and instantly meets the man of his dreams, Tsuchiya. But somehow the realities of love and sex are not as simple and straightforward as all the BL manga he's read has led him to believe.

name: Dokuro no Yakata
nutshell:
A collection of short horror stories.
The volume contains:

RED STRING (Shueisha) 1990
Oni Gokko (Chuokoronsha) 1993
Oni Kon Shiki (Chuokoronsha) 1993
Ihin (Josei Sebun) 1977
Dokuro no Yakata (Josei Sebun) 1979
